column1: Churachandpur is the district for the Kukish language speakers
column2: and headquarters of the Churachandpur District in the Indian state of Manipur.

column1: Churachandpur district boasts a high literacy rate of 74.67% (2001 Census)
column2: above the state literacy average of 68.87% and the Indian average of 64%.

column1: Churachandpur is part of the Outer Manipur Lok Sabha constituency.
